title: Care Guide
subtitle: To wear a corset for a long time, you need to take proper care of it
warning: Use dry cleaning services for stain removal.
minor: Minor dirt can be removed by yourself with detergents:
stepOne: Use a soft brush and mild soap solution.
stepTwo: Carefully remove dirt, then rinse in warm water without wringing.
stepThree: Put on a towel until completely dry.
stepFour: Steam with an iron, placing a cotton cloth, towel, etc. on the top.
